languages.text: Зрелище было одновременно пугающим и завораживающим. Величественный собор, которому было суждено бороздить пустоту, покоился на поражающих воображение гусеницах. Ими он крушил здания, а батареи тяжелых корабельных орудий испепеляли целые танковые соединения. Разве под силу смертным одолеть подобного левиафана?

traits.locale_text: Зрелище было одновренно пугающим и завораживающим. Величественный собор, которому было суждено бороздить пустоту, поставлен на, поражающие воображение своим гигантизмом, гусеницы. Ими он мог легко дробить здания, а батареями тяжелых корабельных орудий равнять с землей целые районы. Разве возможно одолеть подобного левиафана?

languages.text: The sight was both terrifying and mesmerising. A majestic cathedral that was designed to cut through the void was instead resting on treads of a size that staggered the imagination. Those treads were grinding buildings into dust, and the ship's heavy cannons were incinerating entire tank formations. How could mere mortals hope to defeat a behemoth like that?
languages.original_text: Зрелище было одновременно пугающим и завораживающим. Величественный собор, которому было суждено бороздить пустоту, покоился на поражающих воображение гусеницах. Ими он крушил здания, а батареи тяжелых корабельных орудий испепеляли целые танковые соединения. Разве под силу смертным одолеть подобного левиафана?

traits.locale_text: The sight was both terrifying and mesmerising. A majestic cathedral that was designed to cut through the void was instead resting on treads of a size that staggered the imagination, Those treads were grinding buildings into dust, and the ship's heavy cannons were incinerating entire tank formations. How could mere mortals hope to defeat a behemoth like that?

How could mere mortals hope to defeat a behemoth like that?

How could mere mortals hope to defeat a behemoth like that?

Those treads were grinding buildings into dust, and the ship's heavy cannons were incinerating entire tank formations. How could mere mortals hope to defeat a behemoth like that?

The sight was both terrifying and mesmerising. A majestic cathedral that was designed to cut through the void was instead resting on treads of a size that staggered the imagination. Those treads were grinding buildings into dust, and the ship's heavy cannons were incinerating entire tank formations. How could mere mortals hope to defeat a behemoth like that?

languages.text: 眼前的景象既令人畏怖，又令人着迷。这座无比雄伟的大教堂，原本应该用来穿越虚空，可现在，它却被安置在庞大到令人无法想象的巨型履带上。这些沉重的履带足以将整栋建筑碾成尘土，而飞船上的重炮可以将整个坦克编队化为灰烬。区区凡人该如何击败这样的庞然大物？
languages.original_text: The sight was both terrifying and mesmerising. A majestic cathedral that was designed to cut through the void was instead resting on treads of a size that staggered the imagination. Those treads were grinding buildings into dust, and the ship's heavy cannons were incinerating entire tank formations. How could mere mortals hope to defeat a behemoth like that?

traits.locale_text: 眼前的景象既令人畏怖，又令人着迷。这座无比雄伟的大教堂，原本应该用来穿越虚空，可现在，它却被安置在庞大到令人无法想象的巨型履带上。这些沉重的履带足以将整栋建筑碾成尘土，而飞船上的重炮可以将整个坦克编队化为灰烬。区区凡人该如何击败这样的庞然大物？

languages.text: Le spectacle était à la fois terrifiant et fascinant. Au lieu de fendre l'espace, cette majestueuse cathédrale reposait sur des chenilles d'une taille inconcevable qui réduisaient les bâtiments en poussière, tandis que les canons du vaisseau incinéraient des régiments entiers de blindés. Comment de simples mortels pouvaient-ils espérer vaincre un monstre pareil ?
languages.original_text: The sight was both terrifying and mesmerising. A majestic cathedral that was designed to cut through the void was instead resting on treads of a size that staggered the imagination. Those treads were grinding buildings into dust, and the ship's heavy cannons were incinerating entire tank formations. How could mere mortals hope to defeat a behemoth like that?

traits.locale_text: Le spectacle était à la fois terrifiant et fascinant. Au lieu de fendre l'espace, cette majestueuse cathédrale reposait sur des chenilles d'une taille inconcevable qui réduisaient les bâtiments en poussière, tandis que les canons du vaisseau incinéraient des régiments entiers de blindés. Comment de simples mortels pouvaient-ils espérer vaincre un monstre pareil ?

languages.text: その光景は恐ろしくもあり、魅惑的でもあった。虚空を切り裂くように設計された荘厳な大聖堂は想像を絶する大きさのトレッドの上に鎮座し、そのトレッドが建物を粉微塵にして、船の重砲は戦車隊全体を燃やしていた。人間ごときがこのような巨体にどうやって勝てるというのだろう？
languages.original_text: The sight was both terrifying and mesmerising. A majestic cathedral that was designed to cut through the void was instead resting on treads of a size that staggered the imagination. Those treads were grinding buildings into dust, and the ship's heavy cannons were incinerating entire tank formations. How could mere mortals hope to defeat a behemoth like that?

traits.locale_text: その光景は恐ろしくもあり、魅惑的でもあった。虚空を切り裂くように設計された荘厳な大聖堂は想像を絶する大きさのトレッドの上に鎮座し、そのトレッドが建物を粉微塵にして、船の重砲は戦車隊全体を燃やしていた。人間ごときがこのような巨体にどうやって勝てるというのだろう？

languages.text: Era un espectáculo aterrador e hipnótico. Una majestuosa catedral destinada a atravesar el vacío ahora descansaba sobre orugas de un tamaño inconcebible. Estaba arrollando edificios y cada disparo incineraba una formación entera de tanques. ¿Qué podíamos hacer los simples mortales para luchar contra un mastodonte de semejante calibre?
languages.original_text: The sight was both terrifying and mesmerising. A majestic cathedral that was designed to cut through the void was instead resting on treads of a size that staggered the imagination. Those treads were grinding buildings into dust, and the ship's heavy cannons were incinerating entire tank formations. How could mere mortals hope to defeat a behemoth like that?

traits.locale_text: Era un espectáculo aterrador e hipnótico. Una majestuosa catedral destinada a atravesar el vacío ahora descansaba sobre orugas de un tamaño inconcebible. Estaba arrollando edificios y cada disparo incineraba una formación entera de tanques. ¿Qué podíamos hacer los simples mortales para luchar contra un mastodonte de semejante calibre?

languages.text: Der Anblick war furchterregend und hypnotisierend zugleich. Eine majestätische Kathedrale, die dazu erbaut war, durch die Leere zu gleiten, ruhte stattdessen auf Ketten von einer Größe fern jeder Vorstellungskraft. Diese Ketten verwandelten Gebäude in Staub, und die schweren Geschütze des Schiffs äscherten ganze Panzerformationen ein. Wie konnten bloße Sterbliche hoffen, einen solchen Koloss zu besiegen?
languages.original_text: The sight was both terrifying and mesmerising. A majestic cathedral that was designed to cut through the void was instead resting on treads of a size that staggered the imagination. Those treads were grinding buildings into dust, and the ship's heavy cannons were incinerating entire tank formations. How could mere mortals hope to defeat a behemoth like that?

traits.locale_text: Der Anblick war furchterregend und hypnotisierend zugleich. Eine majestätische Kathedrale, die dazu erbaut war, durch die Leere zu gleiten, ruhte stattdessen auf Ketten von einer Größe fern jeder Vorstellungskraft. Diese Ketten verwandelten Gebäude in Staub, und die schweren Geschütze des Schiffs äscherten ganze Panzerformationen ein. Wie konnten bloße Sterbliche hoffen, einen solchen Koloss zu besiegen?

languages.text: Manzara, ürkütücü olmakla birlikte ağzımızı açık bırakmaya yetmişti. Uçsuzu yarıp geçmek üzere özel olarak tasarlanan görkemli katedral, hayal gücünün sınırlarını zorlayan büyüklükte dişli tekerleklerin üzerinde duruyordu. O tekerlekler, binaları un ufak ediyor; geminin ağır topları ise koca bir tank dizilimini küle çeviriyordu. Sıradan ölümlüler, böyle zebella bir şeyi nasıl alt edebilirdi ki?
languages.original_text: The sight was both terrifying and mesmerising. A majestic cathedral that was designed to cut through the void was instead resting on treads of a size that staggered the imagination. Those treads were grinding buildings into dust, and the ship's heavy cannons were incinerating entire tank formations. How could mere mortals hope to defeat a behemoth like that?
